original_text:
for disaster will arise suddenly from them,
    and who knows the ruin that will come from them both?
korean_text: 대저 그들의 재앙은 속히 임하리니 그 둘의 멸망을 누가 알랴

sentences.original_text: for disaster will arise suddenly from them
and who knows the ruin that will come from them both?
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘에게서 올 파멸을 누가 알겠는가?
